editorialSummary.text: Sophisticated hotel offering elegant French dining & a cocktail bar, plus an exercise room.

originalText.text: This review is for the many people who feel hotel employees are away from home slaves or servants! The staff at this hotel have worked there for many years and have ALWAYS felt like this is our home. So when people come to visit, we treat them as if they're family. So our expectations are that we would like you to be aware of this treatment and how we would appreciate it in return. Come over, spend a night, enjoy what we have to offer, take advantage of the different areas, feel safe and leave our home as we would leave yours upon checkout. For those who don't feel they can have hotel etiquette in their vocabulary, please find another place where you can become destructive and/or disrespectful. Please keep in mind, the staff are human beings and they appreciate everything from people just as people should. However, when people come into our home and think we should be seen and not heard, you have another view of people in our line of work. We will be cordial, respectful, humble, etc., but we will not allow you to walk all over us. Just as you want to be treated with respect, the same thing applies to us. Don't come to our home demanding, forcing, incomprehensive or whatever makes you feel slaves and servants are within our hotel. So please treat us as you would like to be treated. Enjoy our location and know that we will do our best to make your stay better than the last one.

originalText.text:
We spent 3 nights here recently. The staff is outstanding, very helpful, friendly, and kind. Our room was a bit small and worn, but overall functional and comfortable. The room came with a coffee maker, iron, ironing board, and hair dryer. Everything was very clean. The bed was quite comfortable. Our only complaint was the room was too warm for us and we eventually resorted to using the AC to cool it off.

The fitness center is well equipped with free weights and multiple cardio machines. It is spacious and well ventilated.

The complimentary breakfast included fresh fruit, apples, pears, bananas, and oranges. A variety of muffins, croissants and Danish were also offered, as well as coffee and tea. We found the coffee to be quite to our liking.

The location is great. Close to Central Park, a short walk to MOMA, and an easy walk to the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Nice diner next door. Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
The hotel absolutely met my expectations. It was the cheapest in this area in December. There is no breakfast but they offer free coffee and e.g. muffins until 11 a.m. (also easy to take away). The staff was always friendly and helpful. Our room was cleaned every day even when we hung out the "do not disturb" sign, they just came later when we were no longer in the room.
When it is colder outside, you should dress a little warmer when sleeping. Many of the attractions are within walking distance (max 30-40 min).
All in all - good place for New York Manhattan visits.

originalText.text:
My stay at Hotel 57 by LuxUrban, part of the Trademark Collection by Wyndham, was absolutely delightful. From the moment I walked in, the elegance of the hotel and the warmth of the welcome made a fantastic first impression. The location is unbeatable, nestled in a vibrant area with easy access to local attractions, dining, and shopping.

The room exceeded my expectations in both comfort and style, offering all the modern amenities needed for a relaxing stay. The attention to detail in the decor and the overall ambiance of the hotel contributed to a truly luxurious experience.

The staff at Hotel 57 was exceptional, always going above and beyond to ensure guests are comfortable and satisfied. Their recommendations for things to do and places to eat in the area were invaluable and enhanced my visit to the city.

Dining at the hotel was a pleasure, with delicious options that catered to a variety of tastes. The cleanliness and safety measures in place throughout the hotel were reassuring, making me feel at ease during my stay.

Overall, Hotel 57 by LuxUrban, Trademark Collection by Wyndham, offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and location, making it a top choice for anyone visiting the area. I'm already looking forward to my next stay at this wonderful hotel.

originalText.text: This place was so great the service was amazing! The locations is great you are a 5 minute walk from Central Park and there is a lot to do around the hotel! The front desk and luggage check service was top tier! They also have a small breakfast and you can’t find that anywhere is nyc. Very satisfied with our stay!
